desc: Redesigned and developed online academy website for Sepehr Academy and its admin panel with a small team using React.js, Axios, TailwindCSS. i designed user interface with Adobe XD myself. this website contained courses and course pages, login and register page, admin panel, articles, etc... also features like applying and cancelling courses by the students, ability to like articles and posting comments on courses, etc

company: Islamic Azad University Staff Cooperative Company
desc: Led the frontend team in designing and developing a responsive website using Figma, ensuring brand consistency and cross-browser compatibility. Integrated frontend components with Laravel, utilizing Tailwind CSS for rapid styling and clean code. Managed tasks via Jira, optimizing website performance through regular testing and debugging.
